scripts.dev: concurrently --names "PRODUCT,FABRICATION,CART,AUTH,ORDER,GATEWAY" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green,yellow,cyan,red" "npm run dev --prefix services/product-micro" "npm run dev --prefix services/fabrication-micro" "npm run dev --prefix services/cart-micro" "npm run dev --prefix services/auth-micro" "npm run dev --prefix services/order-micro" "nodemon server.js"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix services/product-micro && npm install --prefix services/fabrication-micro && npm install --prefix services/cart-micro && npm install --prefix services/auth-micro && npm install --prefix services/order-micro
